Name: Be : Twin
About the game: A place where Seoul's past and present collide and monsters hide the stolen memories of humans: this is . Mirae enters in search of the soul of her sister, lost after a car accident, and her own memories. As she fights off monsters in the forms of her greatest fears, will she be able to find what she seeks? A top-down shooting game where you battle monsters in familiar locations.
